briefTitle: A Feasibility Trial of a Web Based App Intervention in Hormone Positive Breast Cancer Patients to Improve Adherence to Endocrine Therapy
officialTitle: A Feasibility Trial of a Web Based App Intervention in Hormone Positive Breast Cancer Patients to Improve Adherence to Endocrine Therapy
conditions: Anatomic Stage I Breast Cancer AJCC v8, Anatomic Stage II Breast Cancer AJCC v8, HER2-Negative Breast Carcinoma, Hormone Receptor-Positive Breast Carcinoma
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Early-stage hormone receptor positive, HER2-negative breast cancer who have completed all recommended (neo)adjuvant chemotherapy, surgery and/or radiation therapy
* Age \>= 18
* Started on an aromatase inhibitor or Tamoxifen within less than or equal to six months prior to time of enrollment
* Access to internet from a desktop or a smartphone
* Ability to speak English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who are her2 neu positive
